title: [Epidemiology] Researchers have found that a deadly virus that caused an outbreak of hemorrhagic fever in Bolivia, is capable of human-to-human transmission

[Health] The investigational medication finerenone reduced the risk of cardiovascular events by 14% for people with chronic kidney disease and Type 2 diabetes, regardless of whether they had a history of heart disease. The new medication also reduced the rate of death, heart attack, and stroke.
